item.title: How to Build a Budget Spreadsheet in Excel (Step-by-Step Guide)
item.description: Create a custom budget spreadsheet in Excel from scratch. Learn formulas, expense tracking, and goal-setting techniques for complete financial control.

item.title: VLOOKUP vs INDEX MATCH: Which Excel Formula Should You Use?
item.description: Compare VLOOKUP and INDEX MATCH formulas. Learn syntax, limitations, and when to use each for Excel lookups.

item.title: Side Hustle Math: When It's Worth Your Time (And When It Isn't)
item.description: Learn how to calculate net hourly rates, weigh opportunity costs, and recognize burnout before your side hustle costs you more than it earns.

item.title: 5 Excel Formulas Every Person in Debt Should Know
item.description: These five Excel formulas will help you calculate payoff dates, compare strategies, and see exactly how much your debt is costing you.

item.title: YNAB vs Excel: Which Budget Tool Is Right for You?
item.description: Compare YNAB and Excel for budgeting needs. Pros, cons, and honest recommendations for 2026's best budget tool.

item.title: 5 Excel Spreadsheets Every Freelancer Needs Before Tax Season Hits
item.description: The IRS doesn't wait. Build these five spreadsheets now so tax season isn't a disaster.
